meanings: friend, companion, (informal) buddy, (informal) pal, (Brit, inf) mate
기분·걱정 I had a fight with my parents/friend/boyfriend/girlfriend.

phrases.phrase: 친구는 옛 친구가 좋고 옷은 새 옷이 좋다
meanings: Good friends are those who are old, and good clothes are those that are new
follow one's friend to the south of the river
